snippet: The state slashed its revenue projections, and the governor’s budget director announced budget adjustments to allow Kansas to keep paying its bills on time.
abstract: Kansas announces $124 million in budget adjustments after drastically cutting its revenue projections; state has struggled to balance budget since cutting income taxes in 2012 and 2013.
lead_paragraph: The state slashed its revenue projections, and the governor’s budget director announced budget adjustments to allow Kansas to keep paying its bills on time.
